description:
Welcome to the world of MoMo. With MoMo you can send money to friends & family, topup airtime, purchase bundles, pay your bills, merchants and much more. 

It's a one-stop shop for everything you need. MoMo makes it easy to keep track of your money. You can use MoMo services to manage your money..

The FNB Banking App embraces the future of help and our new look and feel will do just that 
Some features to look out for: 

Simple straight-forward navigation – We’ve added bottom navigation to make it easier to find what you need, when you need it. 
Switch users easily – Multiple profiles?  No problem!  Switch seamlessly between different user profiles by selecting profiles located on the bottom navigation and then select “switch user”. 
Introducing the Action Panel – Bringing your banking features front and center, like payments, transfers, my cards, and cash withdrawals. 
Chat Pay – A revolutionary new feature called Chat Pay that allows you to pay any FNB customer via a simple chat, all within FNB’s secure ecosystem giving you peace of mind that the person you are paying has been verified and approved.  It’s that simple. 

What is Pay? 
We have renamed Payments to Pay.  This feature will provide you with access to categories within payments such as pay, receive, pay bills, payment settings, and payment history. 

What is Secure Messaging? 
Chat to other FNB/RMB customers securely on the App by granting access to your contact list.  Features within Secure Messaging include Chat Pay, voice notes, attachments, share location, etc.

Introducing DeltaPay, a groundbreaking mobile-money platform tailored for users in the Kingdom of Eswatini. Enjoy a modern, secure, and user-friendly experience, whether you’re managing individual finances or handling business transactions.

Sign up in less than five minutes and
 - Send & receive money: Instantly transfer funds to other DeltaPay users
 - Pay at merchants by simply scanning a QR code
 - Pay online using the DeltaPay app
 - Collect cashback points at all DeltaPay merchants
 - Cross-transfers with local retail Banks, Instacash, and more

Paidwork is full time or additional job for all people, from every country. You can earn money on any device with access to the internet, wherever you are. You will get paid for your spend time and engagement on the platform.

You can choose how you want to earn money – by playing games, completing surveys, typing texts, answering questions, watching video ads, browsing websites, creating accounts, completing offers and shopping online.

By following simple instructions, just in a month you can earn up to £600 – without any additional taxes and charges. However, there is no limit of your earnings – you set your own working hours.

How Paidwork works:
Step 1. Choose one of the four monetization methods (see below).
Step 2. Follow the instructions. E.g. fill out a survey, play a game, answer a question, create an account, watch a video, test a product and much more.
Step 3. After completing the task correctly you will immediately receive funds to your account.

Monetization methods:
1) Playing games
2) Filling out surveys
3) Watching videos
4) Online shopping
5) Microtasks
6) Scanning receipts

How are the funds paid out?
Available withdrawal methods are: Bank transfer and PayPal. The minimum withdrawal amount is £1. You will receive the funds within 1-2 hours.

How long do I have to earn to withdraw funds?
You earn as much as the time and commitment you want to spend. Perform the most paid tasks such as surveys, games, cashback and registrations. Depending on the difficulty of the task, your salary may be higher.

Is there a referral program?
Yes. You can invite anyone to earn money on Paidwork. You will both get £8 for free when the invited person makes their first payout.

Paidwork app is the only place for free games, free money, cash app, savings, working remotely. Get paid real cash money for playing games, filling out surveys, watching videos, completing offers and typing texts. Make more money for inviting friends! Earn cash money rewards by trying free games, apps, & watching short videos. Get paid cash instantly for shopping & save money with the Paidwork app. Real money and free to use app. Choose anything you want and just start earning!

For any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at: feedback@paidwork.com

A secure and convenient way to manage your money like never before. 
Now you can bank anytime, anywhere. Discover a new way to manage and be in control of your money. 

Make managing your money easier. Download the Nedbank Money App now and enjoy loads of great features. 

Get quick and easy access: 
•	View all your balances in one place 
•	Log in quickly with Touch ID 
•	Link your accounts easily 

Transfer, pay and buy easily: 
•	Transfer money easily between your accounts
•	Buy airtime and data for yourself or any of your phone contacts
•	Buy prepaid electricity
•	Pay all recipients easily  

Enjoy greater card control:
•	Get a holistic view of all your cards
•	Change your ATM withdrawal limit 
•	Block and reorder your cards quickly and easily 
•	Place a temporary ‘freeze’ on your cards should you have misplaced it easily and ‘unfreeze’ once found

Convenient lifestyle tools: 
•	Manage your recipients 
•	Rename your accounts 
•	Share your account details 
•	Use our loan calculators for repayments on Personal Loans, Vehicle Finance and Home Loans; and also send a request for finance

Get in touch with us 
Get all our branch contact details in one place
Locate and navigate to any of our Branches and ATMs 

Enjoy a more secure mobile banking experience and have peace of mind that your information is safe.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Ingcamu App – Stay Connected to Your Pension Anytime, Anywhere
 
The Public Service Pensions Fund (PSPF) proudly introduces the Ingcamu App, your official self-service tool designed to bring pension services closer to you. With a simple and secure interface, the app gives members convenient access to pension information and services—right from your mobile device.
At PSPF, our vision is clear: “Providing an Excellent Memorable Retirement Service Experience.” The Ingcamu App is a step towards achieving this vision by ensuring members remain empowered, informed, and supported throughout their pension journey.
 
What You Can Do with Ingcamu App:
Track Contributions: View your monthly pension contributions and stay up to date with your records anytime.
Access Benefit Statements: Download your statements instantly, whenever you need them.
Plan for the Future: Estimate your pension benefits using the built-in calculator.
Manage Nomination Forms: Download or upload your nomination documents with ease.
Get Important Forms: Access all essential pension forms in just a few taps.
Quick Links: Connect directly to official PSPF resources and contacts.
Share Your Feedback: Tell us about your experience and send suggestions straight through the app.
 
Safe. Secure. Confidential.
Your personal data is always protected. The Ingcamu App uses strong authentication and secure technology to ensure only you can access your information.
 
Take Control of Your Pension Journey.
Download the Ingcamu App today and enjoy the convenience of having PSPF services at your fingertips.

【永豐行動銀行APP】遵循經濟部工業局「行動應用App基本資安規範」，獲頒行動應用資安聯盟資安標章(MAS標章)。

為了讓您隨時隨地享受行動金融所帶來的便利性，永豐銀行提供多元的查詢與交易功能，只要輕點手機，帳戶查詢、轉帳繳款、智能理財、隨心所預。

特色功能：
【快速登入，輕鬆使用】
● 生物辨識：支援Touch ID/Face ID快速登入，省時又便利。
● 圖形密碼：手指一滑就登入，還可以隱藏軌跡，再也不用記密碼。

【創新服務，優質體驗】
● 語音指令：將複雜操作轉化為簡單語音指令，行動金融服務用「說」的真容易。
● 功能搜尋：關鍵字搜尋幫助您更快速的尋找服務，節省時間好方便。
● 常用功能：讓您自行加入最常使用的功能，查詢/交易更快速。
● 帳號分享：將您的銀行帳號變成QR Code，轉帳收款更便利。
● 友善服務：落實公共資訊無障礙，提供您友善金融無障礙服務，使用更貼心。

【智能永豐，化繁為簡】
● 永豐ibrAin：永豐ibrAin 利用AI演算法提供動態投資組合，讓您穩健地朝理財目標邁進。
● 智慧客服：客服一點通提供24小時金融諮詢服務，滿足即時的金融服務需求。

【數位優惠，大戶獨享】
● 數位帳戶：全新推出數位帳戶「大戶DAWHO」專區，滿滿DA優惠等著您來體驗。

【生活繳費，輕鬆搞定】
● 行動繳費：水電瓦斯/電信費/停車費等3,000多項繳費項目，隨手繳，不漏付。

【行動預約，虛實整合】
● 分行預約：提供無卡提款、預約外幣現鈔，以及預約分行取號填單服務等各項虛實整合功能，節省您寶貴的時間。

【推播訊息，一手掌握】
● 自訂推播：自行選擇需要推播的訊息與時間，重要消息不漏接。

歡迎下載「永豐行動銀行」，更多的貼心服務，等著您來發現。

另外本行也提供行動裝置瀏覽器專用的行動銀行網頁版「https://m.sinopac.com」，提供您選擇使用。
為了優化本行服務，本應用程式使用「Cookies」改善使用者體驗。當您安裝使用本應用程式即表示您同意Cookies政策與隱私權政策。更多資訊請參閱(https://bank.sinopac.com/sinopacBT/footer/privacy-statement.html)

提醒您，為確保您的交易安全，建議您可於行動裝置安裝防護軟體，以提高使用安全性。
請勿安裝非官方授權網站或未知來源的永豐行動銀行APP。

Sweat Wallet is your gateway to multichain finance and rewards, trusted by over 20 million users worldwide. Earn crypto through your movement, grow your balance with high-yield Grow Jars, and seamlessly manage crypto tokens across chains.

Start Earning Today
Download Sweat Wallet and step into the future where movement meets real world value.

Key Features:

• Walk & Earn - Convert steps into $SWEAT and start your crypto journey one step at a time. The more you move, the more you earn.

• Gas Fee Savings - Use $SWEAT to pay transaction fees or watch an ad to reduce them up to 100%.

• Grow Jars - Lock $SWEAT to earn boosted returns. Premium options available.

• Trade Crypto - Swap tokens across supported chains via integrated DEX tools.

• Learn and Earn - Complete interactive lessons and earn crypto drops for growing your knowledge.

• PlayHub - Win crypto through gamified challenges like Quests, Spin & Win, and more.

• Mia, Your AI Assistant - Get personalised insights into your earnings, steps, and balance growth strategy.

• Governance Voting - Shape the Sweat Economy by staking and voting on proposals.

• Secure Self-Custody - Sign up with your secret phrase social login feature for full control of your wallet - no one else can access your assets.

Why Sweat Wallet?

Join more than 20 million users already earning $SWEAT
Turn every step into value. Experience fun, learning, and growth powered by crypto.
Stay safe with top-tier encryption and self-custody security
Start Earning Today!
Download Sweat Wallet and step into the future where movement meets real world value.
The SBS Banking App gives you ease of access to your accounts and simplifies your transacting. Easy to use, safe and secure.

Eswatini bank app is Eswatini Bank’s official mobile banking application.
Banking made simpler through the latest Eswatini bank app, You can now be able to do your banking services wherever you are via your mobile device.
To get started, download Eswatini bank app and enroll using self-registration option or visit the nearest Eswatini Bank branch to register.

What you can do.
	•	Check bank balance, view and download statement, request card, hotlist/block card
	•	Transfers to local banks and local wallets
	•	Bill payments-Buy EEC units and make EWSC payments
	•	Recharge-purchase airtime
	•	Cardless withdrawal
	•	ShareSha withdrawal, transfer to mobile, deposits and cancel ShareSha
	•	Forex rate enquiries
	•	Prepaid card loading, balance check and statement request
	•	MTN Mobile money-agent top up and send mobile money 
	•	School fees payment
	•	Proof of payment
	•	Eswatini Mobile e-Mali-transfer to Eswatini mobile E-mali wallet
	•	Feedback
	•	Scan and Pay
	•	Generate QR code

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
Unayo, the latest offering from Standard Bank, is a platform of possibilities. 

Designed to enable fully digital onboarding and account creation for Citizens, Foreign Nationals, Asylum Seekers and Refugees living in any one of Unayo's active countries. 

Sign up is easy and compliant with local regulations. Simply:
- Download the app
- Select your citizenship
- Complete your information
- Verify your contact information
- Follow the prompts to take pictures of yourself and your documents
- Submit them for review and approval

Within no time, you will be able to transact with people in your network. You will be able to perform the following transactions:

Free
- Inter-account transfers
- Pay
- Send Money (incl. bulk)
- EFT to Standard Bank account
- Cash-in

Tiered Fees
- EFT to other banks
- EFT to other wallets
- Cash-out

The platform is intent on driving financial inclusion and encouraging economic and entrepreneurial growth by creating an ecosystem of clients and merchants. These merchants can facilitate transactions (such as cash-in, cash-out, send money and voucher payments) and earn commission on cash-ins, cash-outs and withdrawals. Creating a network of merchants, driven by virality.

Download the app to get started!

Unayo - it's all in here.

FxLens helps forex traders make smarter decisions using expert-trained AI. 

How it works:

Get our expert-curated daily analysis

and/or

1. Upload your 4-hour and 15-minute chart screenshots for instant analysis.
2. Get directional bias from news events.
3. Build structured trade plans tailored to your strategy.
4. Access learning resources on chart and candlestick patterns.
Whether you're scalping or swing trading, FxLens simplifies the technical and fundamental processes into one powerful tool.

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
Your money, your way

Easily track your finances, discover tools and features to help you manage your money, and explore personalised offers – all at your fingertips.

Effortless day-to-day banking

• Quick payments and transfers: Send money with ease
• Top up instantly: Buy airtime, data, SMS bundles, and electricity
• Send money vouchers: Share cash vouchers to anyone with a cellphone
• Hassle-free international payments: Make global transactions in just a few taps
• Play Lotto: Try your luck directly from the app

Take control of your money

• Open a savings account online: Start saving in minutes
• Manage your cards: Set payment limits, stop or replace cards quickly
• Access documents on-demand: Get stamped statements, bank letters and tax certificates
• Quick balance checks: View your balances without signing in
• Track insurance claims: Submit and monitor your building insurance claims easily

Everything you need, all in one place

• One view of all your accounts: See all your Standard Bank accounts in one convenient place
• Manage your loans: Handle your personal, vehicle and home loans with ease
• Get vehicle loan pre-approval: Apply for pre-approval in just a few taps
• Link your accounts to trading: Manage your share trading profile directly from the app
• Monitor your investments: View your Stanlib investments anytime, anywhere

Note: Availability of some features may vary depending on your region.

Your app will automatically update to ensure you always have the latest features and security upgrades.

Getting started

Simply download the app using data (charges apply for the initial download), but once you’re set-up, there are no data charges when using the app. As long as you have a connection, your banking is ready to go!

Transactional features are available to Standard Bank accounts held in South Africa, Ghana, Uganda, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Tanzania, Lesotho, Malawi, eSwatini and Namibia. Keep in mind that some types of payments include transaction fees.  

Legal info  

The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act; and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.  

Stanbic Bank Botswana Limited is a Company (registration number: 1991/1343) incorporated in the Republic of Botswana and a registered commercial bank. Namibia: Standard Bank is a licensed banking institution in terms of the Banking Institutions Act, registration number 78/01799. Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited is regulated by the Bank of Uganda.
Mine Chain is a visualization revenue management application designed specifically for cryptocurrency miners. It supports manual addition of mining machines and mining records.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
